charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1101_0200_2:
Thinking that he was secretly training,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] followed him.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_0400_1:
Wait... [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
What are you doing here?!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_0500_1:
Sorry I startled you.
Treecko looked like he was itching for a fight.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0401_0700_1:
Man, Trainers aiming for the top 
have some guts, don’t they?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0302_0800_1: I felt my heart skip a beat!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0402_0900_1:
Sorry, sorry!
But in my defense, you did let your guard down.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1000_1:
Treecko and I were just in the middle of trying
to figure out some new tactics.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1100_1:
Treecko can climb trees and walls using the
small hooks on his hands and feet.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1200_1:
I was just wondering if that would be 
something we can use on the ground, too.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1300_1:
As long as I’m here, I’d like to do
everything I possibly can!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1400_1:
I’m probably going to end up battling my
father, too.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1500_1:
It’s a little awkward going up against your own
family, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1600_1:
I mean, it clearly shows you who’s
stronger, right?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1700_1:
And it doesn’t matter whether you win or lose.
It will still become awkward. I mean...what do
you talk about after that?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1800_1:
But that wasn’t the case for my dad. He lost to
me, but he seemed a little happy.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1900_1:
I don’t get it...
It’s frustrating when you lose, right?
At least, I don’t like losing.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_2400_1:
I get to have a strong rival really close by!
How could I not battle him?!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_2500_1:
Besides, I can’t say that I’m stronger than him
just because I beat him once.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_2600_1:
Maybe if my dad and I had different specialties,
like the neighbors do, I wouldn’t be so bothered.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0401_2800_1:
Yeah, Professor Birch and May.
They’re my next-door neighbors.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0402_3000_1:
Yeah, like Professor Birch and May have.
They’re my next-door neighbors.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3100_1:
Professor Birch focuses on his fieldwork,
and May focuses on her contests.
See? No overlap.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3200_1:
But thinking like that is just me running away.
While clashing can be tough, it might actually
be fortunate at the same time.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3300_1:
My dad is strong and respectable.
That’s why I want to overcome him.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3400_1:
And that’s why I have to get even better at
my specialty!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3600_1:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Let’s have a battle sometime!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3700_1: That way I can see how much stronger I’ve gotten!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_1201_0100_1:
Well, if it isn’t Brendan!
I heard your tail is on fire right now!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_1201_0200_1:
Oh hi, Noland! What’s a Frontier Brain doing here?
Wait, did you just call me a Charmander?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_1201_0300_1:
You know what I mean. But how about it?
You want me to test how strong you’ve gotten?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_1201_0400_1:
Uh, I’m not sure I do, but if it’s a 
Pokémon battle you want, you got it!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0101_0100_1: All right, then! Let’s see what you got.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0100_1:
Yeah! You get it, don’t you?
I learned a lot from that battle!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0200_1: Wait, doesn’t it bother you that you lost?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0300_1:
Of course it bothers me!
But I’m more happy than frustrated!
This defeat is great experience!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0400_1:
I gotta go home and reflect on this 
before I forget anything!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0500_1:
Man, that is one busy guy...
Hey! If you ever need somebody to battle again,
let me know!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0600_1:
Wha...Treecko?
Oh, you must have leveled up with that last battle!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0700_1:
I’m so excited to see you evolve, Treecko!
We’re gonna have even more fun together now!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_1201_0100_1:
Look at you, Brendan!
You and Grovyle have grown so much!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_1201_0200_1:
How about it? You want to have a battle?
I want to see if you’ve gotten any stronger.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_1201_0400_1:
Come on!
Let’s show him what we can do, Grovyle!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0101_0100_1:
You don’t know how happy it makes me that
I get to battle you like this, son!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0101_0200_1:
I’m going all out on this, so you’d better
not hold anything back either!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0501_0100_1:
I gave it everything I had.
There’s nothing to regret!
That was a great battle, Brendan!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0501_0200_1:
You’ve really gotten strong, haven’t you?
I feel like I need to go into the mountains and
train some more.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0501_0300_1:
All right, Dad. Just don’t overdo it, OK? 
Or else you’ll have to answer to Mom again.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0501_0500_1:
If you become any stronger and cooler, I don’t
think anyone will have a chance against us!
